          <title>
            <string language="en">Frozen milk can't flow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefrorene Milch kann nicht fließen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le lait surgelé ne peut pas couler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O leite frozen não pode fluir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il latte frozen non può fluire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παγωμένο γάλα δεν μπορεί να ρεύσει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La leche congelada no puede fluir</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These cartoons show that you cannot pour frozen milk because it is solid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">milk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">snow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikaturen zeigen, daß Sie nicht 
gefrorene Milch gießen können, weil sie fest ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces dessins animés prouvent que vous ne pouvez 
pas verser le lait congelé parce qu'il est plein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes cartoons mostram que você não pode 
derramar o leite congelado porque é contínuo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi fumetti indicano che non potete versare il
latte congelato perché è solido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια δείχνουν ότι δεν μπορείτε 
να χύσετε το παγωμένο γάλα επειδή είναι στερεό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas historietas muestran que usted no puede 
verter la leche congelada porque es sólida.</string>
          </description>
